import { Button } from "../button" import { useState } from "react" import rs from "../assets/rs.png" import "./style.css" export const Form = ({ listTransactions, setListTransactions }) => { const [infoInput, setInfoInput] = useState("") const [infoValue, setInfoValue] = useState("") const [infoSelect, setInfoSelect] = useState("Entrada") function addTodo(input, select, value) { const infos = { descricao: input, valor: value, tipo: select } setListTransactions([...listTransactions, infos]); } console.log(listTransactions) return (
{ event.preventDefault() }}>
setInfoInput(event.target.value)} value={infoInput} /> Ex: Compra de roupas
setInfoValue(event.target.value)} value={infoValue} />
) }
